jobDescription: As an HR trainee at Atrina, you will gain practical experience and insight into various aspects of HR operations. Your role will involve hands-on involvement in areas such as recruitment, employee relations, training, and development, with the opportunity to closely work with experienced HR professionals. This position serves as an excellent entry point for individuals aspiring to build a career in human resources.
preferredQualifications: Full time Bachelor's or Master's degree in Human Resources
Strong interest in pursuing a career in Human Resources
Attention to detail and strong organizational skills
Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality and professionalism
Proficiency in Microsoft office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
Adaptability and a willingness to learn in a dynamic environment
Positive attitude, team player and self-motivation
